resources.string: This app was developed by Vinicius Borges, software engineer student at Brasilia University. Don\'t forget to evaluate this app.

This app require internet connection, enable it to continue.

It also require Admin Acess and Samsung's license activation.
Remind that Samsung's license activation is on their server, so sometimes it won't work because of internet traffic. So be patient and try again later.

To uninstall this app go to options and click uninstall.
